{"id":1530032372,"question_id":3372,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4Â days","timestamp":1738602048,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1530032372/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Strictly Increasing or Strictly Decreasing Subarray","memory":"27.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int longestMonotonicSubarray(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int res = 1;\n        int cnt_i = 1;\n        int cnt_d = 1;\n        for(int i=1; i<nums.size(); i++) {\n            if(nums[i-1] > nums[i])\n                cnt_d++;\n            else\n                cnt_d = 1;\n            if(nums[i-1] < nums[i])\n                cnt_i++;\n            else\n                cnt_i = 1;\n            res = max({res, cnt_i, cnt_d});\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-strictly-increasing-or-strictly-decreasing-subarray","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
